code: import axios from'axios';import TopBar from'../TopBar';import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function UploadPage(){const[status,setStatus]=useState('');const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const handleFileChange=event=>{setFile(event.target.files[0]);};const handleUpload=async()=>{if(!file){setStatus('No file selected');return;}const formData=new FormData();formData.append('Images',file);try{await axios.post('/api/v1/images/upload',formData,{headers:{'Authorization':`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`,'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});setStatus('Uploaded');}catch(error){setStatus('Upload failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("head",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleUpload,children:"Upload Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:status})]})]});}export default UploadPage;
